message.content: cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.NE. The paper focuses on the task of semantic relation extraction and classification in scientific papers using neural networks, which falls under the sub-fields of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and ML. The use of convolutional neural networks also suggests the possibility of the paper belonging to cs.LG (Machine Learning), while the focus on information retrieval and classification could place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the use of neural networks for classification could also suggest the paper belonging to cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
